dialogue.text: WHAT THE FUCK HAPPENED TO THOSE FUNKY ASS DANCIN DUDES!?!?!?!?!?!?
Don't worry, I've got plenty of my henchmen to fill in their positions...
That's not the issue here!\nYOU SAW THEM GET DECAPITATED!!!!
But what did you think of the song?\nIt's not released to the public yet...
Stop trying to 'flatter' me with your mediocre music making skills
The only thing that flatters me is beautiful violet hair blowing in the wind.
Wait.\nWho or Where does my gf get her hair color from???
Why you gotta dye your hair cuz?\nWhats wrong?
Purple dosen't look good with green.
Bitch your eyes are glowin purple.
Belive me, I've told her thousands of times already.
Fuck your gray ass hair.\nEmbrace the gracefull, hot, sexy, and beautiful violet hair
And lets get on with this absolute nightmare of a game of 'balance'.
I just wanna go on my date with my girlfriend..\nis that too much to ask for???
